column2: Based on the best-selling novel by Singaporean author Kevin Kwan, the new film adaptation, "Crazy Rich Asians," gives Singapore and its unique blend of cultures the full Hollywood treatment. https://t.co/4BzwrerQGm

@FridaGhitis @thehill Of all of the "terrible headlines" provided by "The Hill, CNN, MSNBC, etc, this is an odd one to show concern about.  Especially from a "columnist, author, CNN Opinion"

Based on the impression that Waters herself generates, wouldn't Trump be rightly expressing an opinion?

@DJKing_IsHipHop @DudBailey @SkidCrease @realDonaldTrump @CNN The quote is from a book written about LBJ, Inside the Whitehouse. Did he say it? Only the author knows for sure but based on other things he's said it's not out of character.

@stillgray That isn't the content of the argument. You attributed a statement to CNN when it was expressed by an author featured in an article. It's the kind of skewed reporting you accuse MSM of. I'm all for diversity of thought but counterpoints are only strong if they're based on truth.
